mapper.sql: user_id, user_name, user_phone, user_idcard, user_deed, user_dist_id, user_address, user_type, user_gas_type, user_status, user_locked, service_times, free_gas_flag, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, usable, remarks
mapper.select:
select
from user where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and usable = 1 and user_status = 3
mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_name, user_phone, user_idcard, user_deed, user_dist_id, user_address, user_type, user_gas_type, user_status, user_locked, service_times, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, usable, remarks) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userDeed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userDistId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userGasType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userLocked,jdbcType=BIT}, #{serviceTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

user_id,
user_name,
user_phone,
user_idcard,
user_deed,
user_dist_id,

user_type,
user_gas_type,
user_status,

update_by,

mapper.update:
update user
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_idcard = #{userIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_deed = #{userDeed,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_dist_id = #{userDistId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_address = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_gas_type = #{userGasType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_locked = #{userLocked,jdbcType=BIT},
service_times = #{serviceTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
usable = #{usable,jdbcType=BIT},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_idcard = #{userIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_deed = #{userDeed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_dist_id = #{userDistId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_address = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_gas_type = #{userGasType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_locked = #{userLocked,jdbcType=BIT}, service_times = #{serviceTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, usable = #{usable,jdbcType=BIT}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select u.user_id, u.user_dist_id, dist.dist_name as user_dist_name, u.user_address, u.user_type, sd.dict_key as user_type_name, u.user_gas_type, sd2.dict_key as user_gas_type_name, u.user_status, sd3.dict_key as user_status_name, u.user_locked, mt.meter_category, u.create_time, u.create_by, u.update_time, u.update_by, u.usable, u.remarks from user u LEFT JOIN user_meters um ON u.user_id=um.user_id and um.usable = 1 LEFT JOIN meter m ON um.meter_id=m.meter_id and m.usable=1 LEFT JOIN meter_type mt ON m.meter_type_id=mt.meter_type_id left join sys_district dist on u.user_dist_id = dist.dist_id LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary sd on u.user_type = sd.dict_value and sd.dict_category = 'user_type' and sd.usable = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary sd2 on u.user_gas_type = sd2.dict_value and sd2.dict_category = 'user_gas_type' and sd.usable = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary sd3 on u.user_status = sd3.dict_value and sd3.dict_category = 'user_status' and sd.usable = 1 where u.usable = 1 order by u.user_id
mapper.insert:
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user (user_dist_id, user_address, user_type, user_gas_type, user_locked, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, remarks, free_gas_flag) values (#{userDistId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userGasType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userLocked,jdbcType=BIT}, NOW(), #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NOW(), #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, (#{userType} = 1))
mapper.update: update user set user_dist_id = #{userDistId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_address = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_gas_type = #{userGasType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = NOW(), update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select u.user_id, u.user_dist_id, dist.dist_name as user_dist_name, u.user_address, u.user_type, sd.dict_key as user_type_name, u.user_gas_type, sd2.dict_key as user_gas_type_name, u.user_status, sd3.dict_key as user_status_name, u.user_locked, mt.meter_category, u.create_time, u.create_by, u.update_time, u.update_by, u.usable, u.remarks from user u LEFT JOIN user_meters um ON u.user_id=um.user_id and um.usable = 1 LEFT JOIN meter m ON um.meter_id=m.meter_id and m.usable=1 LEFT JOIN meter_type mt ON m.meter_type_id=mt.meter_type_id left join sys_district dist on u.user_dist_id = dist.dist_id LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary sd on u.user_type = sd.dict_value and sd.dict_category = 'user_type' and sd.usable = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary sd2 on u.user_gas_type = sd2.dict_value and sd2.dict_category = 'user_gas_type' and sd2.usable = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary sd3 on u.user_status = sd3.dict_value and sd3.dict_category = 'user_status' and sd3.usable = 1 where u.usable = 1 and u.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and u.user_status = 3

select u.user_id, u.user_dist_id, sd.dist_name as user_dist_name, u.user_address, u.user_status, sd2.dict_key as user_status_name , m.meter_code from user u LEFT JOIN user_meters um ON u.user_id = um.user_id and um.usable = 1 LEFT JOIN meter m ON um.meter_id = m.meter_id LEFT JOIN sys_district sd on u.user_dist_id = sd.dist_id LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary sd2 on u.user_status = sd2.dict_value and sd2.dict_category = 'user_status' and sd2.usable = 1 WHERE u.usable = 1 and u.user_status = 1 ORDER BY u.user_id

select u.user_id, u.user_dist_id, sd.dist_name as user_dist_name, u.user_address, u.user_status, sd2.dict_key as user_status_name , m.meter_code from user u LEFT JOIN user_meters um ON u.user_id = um.user_id and um.usable = 1 LEFT JOIN meter m ON um.meter_id = m.meter_id LEFT JOIN sys_district sd on u.user_dist_id = sd.dist_id LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary sd2 on u.user_status = sd2.dict_value and sd2.dict_category = 'user_status' and sd2.usable = 1 WHERE u.usable = 1 and u.user_status = 1
AND u.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, '%')
AND u.user_dist_id = #{userDistId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND u.user_address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userAddress,jdbcType=INTEGER}, '%')
ORDER BY u.user_id
mapper.update: update user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_idcard = #{userIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_deed = #{userDeed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_status = #{userStatus}, user_locked = #{userLocked,jdbcType=BIT}, service_times = #{serviceTimes}, open_time = NOW(), open_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = NOW(), update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, usable = #{usable,jdbcType=BIT}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count (1) from user

select
from user where iccard_id = #{iccardId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and usable = 1

select
from user where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and usable = 1

select u.user_id, u.user_name,uc.card_id as iccard_id, dist.dist_name, u.user_address, IFNULL(ul.is_lock,0) as is_lock, (CASE WHEN is_lock=1 THEN '锁定' WHEN is_lock=0 THEN '未锁定' ELSE '未锁定' END) AS lockStatus, '' as lock_reason, ul.lock_reason as last_lock_reason from user u left join user_card uc on u.user_id = uc.user_id left join sys_district dist on u.user_dist_id = dist.dist_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT us.user_id, IFNULL(us.is_lock,0) is_lock, us.lock_reason , us.create_time FROM user_lock us , (SELECT user_id , MAX(create_time) AS create_time FROM user_lock GROUP BY user_id) um WHERE us.user_id = um.user_id AND us.create_time = um.create_time ) ul ON u.user_id = ul.user_id where u.usable = 1 AND uc.usable=1
AND u.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND u.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND uc.card_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{iccardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND u.user_status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into user_lock (user_id, is_lock,lock_reason,create_time, create_by,update_time,update_by ,usable, remarks) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{isLock,jdbcType=BIT},#{lockReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},NOW(),#{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},NOW(), #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{usable,jdbcType=BIT},#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user set service_times = service_times +1 where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select service_times from user where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update user set user_fill_gas_status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT} where user_id = #{userId} and usable = 1

update user
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_idcard = #{userIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_deed = #{userDeed,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update user SET usable=0 where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT u.user_id as userId, u.user_name as userName, u.user_address as userAddress, u.user_type as userType, u.user_gas_type as userGasType, orders.order_id as orderId, orders.order_payment as orderPayment, orders.order_gas as orderGas, orders.employee_id as employeeId, orders.order_status as orderStatus, orders.create_time as orderCreateTime, orders.order_type as orderType, orders.account_state as accountState, orders.order_strike_time as orderStrikeTime, sd.dict_key AS userTypeName , sd2.dict_key AS userGasTypeName, sd3.dict_key AS orderTypeName, sd4.dict_key AS accountStateName FROM user_orders orders LEFT JOIN user u ON orders.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_district dist ON u.user_dist_id = dist.dist_id LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary sd ON u.user_type = sd.dict_value AND sd.dict_category = 'user_type' AND sd.usable = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary sd2 ON u.user_gas_type = sd2.dict_value AND sd2.dict_category = 'user_gas_type' AND sd2.usable = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary sd3 ON orders.order_type = sd3.dict_value AND sd3.dict_category = 'order_type' AND sd3.usable = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary sd4 ON orders.account_state = sd4.dict_value AND sd4.dict_category = 'account_state' AND sd4.usable = 1 WHERE orders.order_type IN ( '2') AND orders.free_gas ='0.0'
AND u.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND sd.dict_value = #{userType}
AND orders.employee_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{employeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND TO_DAYS(orders.create_time) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) ORDER BY orderCreateTime DESC

select u.user_id as userId, u.user_name as userName, sd.dist_name as userDistName, u.user_address as userAddress, sd1.dict_key AS userTypeName , sd2.dict_key AS userGasTypeName, e.emp_name as openByName, u.open_time as openTime from user u left join sys_district sd on u.user_dist_id = sd.dist_id AND sd.usable = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary sd1 ON u.user_type = sd1.dict_value AND sd1.dict_category = 'user_type' AND sd1.usable = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary sd2 ON u.user_gas_type = sd2.dict_value AND sd2.dict_category = 'user_gas_type' AND sd2.usable = 1 LEFT JOIN employee e on u.open_by = e.emp_id where u.usable = 1 and u.user_status = 3
AND u.open_time >= #{startDate}
AND u.open_time < DATE_ADD(#{endDate},interval 1 day)
AND u.user_dist_id IN (${distIds})
AND u.user_address like CONCAT('%',#{userAddress},'%')
ORDER BY u.open_time DESC

SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.user_name AS userName, u.user_phone AS userPhone, u.user_idcard AS userIdcard, u.user_deed AS userDeed, u.user_dist_id AS userDistId, u.user_address AS userAddress, u.user_type AS userType, u.user_gas_type AS userGasType, u.user_status AS userStatus, u.user_locked AS userLocked, u.service_times AS serviceTimes, u.free_gas_flag AS freeGasFlag, u.create_time AS createTime, u.create_by AS createBy, u.update_time AS updateTime, u.update_by AS updateBy, u.usable, u.remarks, uo.totalOrderTimes, uo.totalOrderGas FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN (SELECT user_id, card_identifier, usable FROM user_card WHERE usable = 1) uc ON u.user_id = uc.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT user_id, COUNT(order_id) AS totalOrderTimes, SUM(order_gas) AS totalOrderGas, SUM(order_payment) AS totalOrderPayment FROM user_orders WHERE order_status NOT IN (4) GROUP BY user_id) uo ON u.user_id = uo.user_id LEFT JOIN user_meters um ON u.user_id = um.user_id LEFT JOIN meter m ON um.meter_id = m.meter_id WHERE u.usable = 1 GROUP BY u.user_id ORDER BY u.create_time
select is_lock as isLock from user_lock where user_id = #{userId} order by create_time desc LIMIT 1
SELECT sd3.dict_key FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary sd3 ON u.user_status = sd3.dict_value AND sd3.dict_category = 'user_status' AND sd3.usable = 1 WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update user set user_name = #{userName}, user_phone = #{userPhone}, user_idcard = #{userIdcard}, user_deed = #{userDeed}, user_dist_id = #{userDistId}, user_address = #{userAddress}, user_type = #{userType}, user_gas_type = #{userGasType}, update_time = NOW(), update_by = #{updateBy} where user_id = #{userId}

update user set user_status = #{userStatus}, user_locked = #{userLocked,jdbcType=BIT}, update_time = NOW(), update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, usable = #{usable,jdbcType=BIT}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update user set free_gas_flag = 1 where usable = 1 and user_type = 1
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_phone, u.user_idcard, u.user_deed, u.user_dist_id, dist.dist_name as user_dist_name, u.user_address, u.user_type, sd1.dict_key as user_type_name, u.user_gas_type, sd2.dict_key as user_gas_type_name, u.user_status, sd3.dict_key as user_status_name, u.user_locked, m.meter_id, m.meter_code, uc.user_card_id, uc.card_id, uc.card_identifier, u.create_time, u.create_by, u.update_time, u.update_by, u.usable, u.remarks FROM user u left join user_meters um on u.user_id = um.user_id and um.usable = 1 left join meter m on um.meter_id = m.meter_id and m.usable = 1 left join user_card uc on uc.user_id = u.user_id and uc.usable = 1 left join sys_district dist on u.user_dist_id = dist.dist_id and dist.usable = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary sd1 on u.user_type = sd1.dict_value and sd1.dict_category = 'user_type' and sd1.usable = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary sd2 on u.user_gas_type = sd2.dict_value and sd2.dict_category = 'user_gas_type' and sd2.usable = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary sd3 on u.user_status = sd3.dict_value and sd3.dict_category = 'user_status' and sd3.usable = 1 where u.usable = 1 and u.user_id = #{userId}
select free_gas_flag from user where usable = 1 and user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `user` WHERE usable = 1 AND user_id = #{userId} AND user_type IN ('9', '10', '11')
